name: Grounded(itch)
description:
Air traffic control is a stressful job, even when you don't have to land every plane on earth! Don't worry, this game's got you covered with some mellow music and relaxing visuals; you're gonna be fine... for a little while.
Use the mouse to select a plane and draw a path to the same colored landing zone. Landing zones will be cleared of planes after a time. Plane collisions end the game, and incorrectly-zoned landings increase the amount of time it takes to clear a zone.
Made for Weekly Game Jam Week 11
Music:
"Severe Tire Damage" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
